quizzes.title: Titanic
clues: This epic romance takes place on a famous, ill-fated ship.
It's known for its iconic 'I'm the king of the world!' scene.
A large blue diamond plays a significant role in the story.
One of the leads poses for a portrait while wearing only the necklace.
The ship hits an iceberg.

quizzes.title: Jurassic Park
clues: Welcome... to an island where science has gone too far.
Clones of prehistoric creatures run rampant.
A vibrating glass of water signals approaching danger.
The main gate opens to a world of awe and terror.
It involves a park and creatures that lived millions of years ago.

quizzes.title: The Lion King
clues: This animated film features a young cub destined for royalty.
Its soundtrack includes 'Circle of Life' and 'Hakuna Matata'.
A tragic event involving a stampede changes everything.
The villain has a scar over his eye.
It's a coming-of-age story in the African savanna.

quizzes.title: Toy Story
clues: What if your playthings came to life when you weren't looking?
A new space ranger toy causes jealousy in the leader of the group.
The main characters escape from a menacing neighbor.
One character's catchphrase is 'To infinity and beyond!'
It's about the secret life of a child's collection.

quizzes.title: Home Alone
clues: A family accidentally leaves their youngest member behind for Christmas.
He defends his house from two bumbling burglars.
The traps he sets are famously elaborate and painful.
A classic scene involves aftershave and a scream.
It's a holiday comedy about a child left by himself.

quizzes.title: Forrest Gump
clues: Life is like a box of chocolates...
This man with a low IQ experiences major historical events.
He becomes a decorated war hero, a ping-pong champion, and a shrimp boat captain.
He runs across America for no particular reason.
A feather floating in the wind is a recurring motif.

quizzes.title: Finding Nemo
clues: A clownfish father crosses the ocean to find his son.
He's aided by a blue tang with short-term memory loss.
They encounter sharks who are trying to be vegetarians.
The son ends up in a dentist's office fish tank.
It's an animated adventure set under the sea.

quizzes.title: Toy Story 2
clues: The space ranger has to rescue his cowboy friend.
They discover their friend is a valuable collectible.
A whole gang of new friends from a TV show are introduced.
One of the new characters yodels.
It's the sequel where the toys meet more of their kind.

quizzes.title: Spider-Man
clues: A high school student gains incredible powers after a bite.
He learns that with great power comes great responsibility.
His first major villain is a wealthy industrialist in a green suit.
He swings through the city on webs.
This hero wears a red and blue suit.

quizzes.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
clues: A young orphan discovers he's a wizard on his eleventh birthday.
He attends a magical boarding school.
He makes two loyal friends on a train.
The climax involves a magical stone.
The main character has a lightning bolt scar.

quizzes.title: Shrek
clues: An ogre just wants peace and quiet in his swamp.
He embarks on a quest with a talkative donkey.
Their mission is to rescue a princess from a dragon.
The villain is a very short lord.
It's an animated fairytale parody.

quizzes.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
clues: A swashbuckling adventure on the high seas.
Cursed treasure turns pirates into skeletal beings under moonlight.
A blacksmith teams up with a rogue captain to rescue his love.
The main ship is called the Black Pearl.
It features a very eccentric pirate captain.

quizzes.title: Monsters, Inc.
clues: A world where monsters generate power from children's screams.
Two best friends, one large and furry, the other small and green, work at a scream factory.
A human child accidentally enters their world.
The child's laugh proves to be more powerful than screams.
The main characters work in a factory that scares kids.

quizzes.title: The Incredibles
clues: A family of former heroes must secretly use their powers again.
The mother has incredible flexibility.
The father has super strength and works in insurance.
The fashion designer insists 'No capes!'
It's about a hidden family of super-powered individuals.

quizzes.title: Despicable Me
clues: A supervillain's plans are complicated by three orphan girls.
He aims to steal the moon.
His army consists of small, yellow, gibberish-speaking creatures.
He warms up to the idea of being a dad.
It features a bad guy who slowly becomes good.

quizzes.title: Frozen
clues: A queen with ice powers accidentally plunges her kingdom into eternal winter.
Her determined sister sets off to find her.
A talking snowman loves warm hugs.
The hit song is 'Let It Go'.
It's an animated musical about two royal sisters.

quizzes.title: Minions
clues: These small, yellow creatures search for the most despicable master.
They journey from the dawn of time to the 1960s.
Their ultimate goal is to serve an evil overlord.
They inadvertently cause chaos wherever they go.
This film focuses on the backstory of popular small, yellow sidekicks.

quizzes.title: Zootopia
clues: In a city where animals coexist, a rookie bunny cop tries to prove herself.
She partners with a cunning fox.
They uncover a conspiracy involving predator animals going savage.
A key scene involves a DMV run by sloths.
It's an animated mystery set in a world of anthropomorphic animals.

quizzes.title: Moana
clues: A strong-willed teenager sets sail to save her people.
She seeks out a demigod with a magical fishhook.
The ocean itself seems to have a personality.
The climactic confrontation is with a fiery demon.
It's a Polynesian-inspired animated adventure.

quizzes.title: Coco
clues: A young aspiring musician is transported to the Land of the Dead.
He seeks the blessing of his family's musical ancestor.
Marigolds are a significant symbol in this film.
The film explores themes of family, memory, and tradition during DÃ­a de Muertos.
A boy tries to become a singer against his family's wishes.

quizzes.title: Inception
clues: This film deals with stealing information from targets by entering their dreams.
It features a team that builds and navigates intricate dreamscapes.
A spinning top is a key totem for one of the characters.
The main goal is to plant an idea, not steal one.
It's known for its mind-bending plot and stunning visual effects, especially a hallway fight scene.

quizzes.title: The Dark Knight
clues: The hero of Gotham faces off against a chaotic agent with a penchant for anarchy.
A pencil disappears in a very specific way.
The city's district attorney becomes a tragic figure.
The antagonist asks 'Why so serious?'
It's a gritty superhero sequel with a memorable villain.

quizzes.title: Pulp Fiction
clues: This non-linear narrative connects several crime stories in Los Angeles.
A mysterious briefcase is a central, yet unexplained, object.
A dance contest and a shot of adrenaline are key scenes.
One character is known for his biblical quotes before a hit.
It's a highly influential independent film with iconic dialogue.

quizzes.title: Parasite
clues: A poor family gradually infiltrates a wealthy household, one by one.
The film masterfully blends elements of dark comedy, thriller, and drama.
A specific rock is a symbolic gift passed between family members.
The basement holds a dark secret.
It's a South Korean film that won Best Picture.

quizzes.title: Spirited Away
clues: A young girl wanders into a world of spirits and works in a bathhouse.
Her parents are transformed into pigs.
She encounters a mysterious boy who helps her navigate this strange new reality.
A faceless spirit who consumes others becomes a prominent figure.
It's a critically acclaimed animated fantasy from Japan.

quizzes.title: Joker
clues: This character's origin story depicts a failed comedian's descent into madness.
It features a memorable stairway dance scene.
His laughter is often uncontrollable and painful.
The film paints a grim picture of Gotham's societal issues.
It explores the mental decline of a future iconic villain.

quizzes.title: Whiplash
clues: A talented drummer strives for perfection under a ruthless instructor.
The film features intense, sweat-soaked musical performances.
A specific jazz piece, 'Caravan,' is central to the narrative.
The instructor throws a cymbal at one point.
It's a gripping drama about ambition and abuse in a music conservatory.

quizzes.title: Get Out
clues: A young man visits his girlfriend's family estate for the first time.
He soon discovers disturbing secrets beneath their liberal facade.
Teacups and spoons play a chilling role in inducing a 'Sunken Place'.
The family engages in bizarre rituals involving elderly people.
It's a horror film that cleverly satirizes racial tensions.

quizzes.title: Interstellar
clues: Humanity seeks a new home through a wormhole as Earth dies.
Time dilation is a crucial plot element.
A dusty farmhouse and cornfields are early settings.
The protagonist communicates with his daughter through gravity.
It's a grand science fiction epic involving space travel and black holes.

quizzes.title: Blade Runner 2049
clues: A synthetic human police officer uncovers a long-buried secret.
The futuristic Los Angeles is constantly rainy and bleak.
Whisky is a preferred drink in this desolate world.
A key discovery is a wooden horse.
It's a visually stunning sequel to a cyberpunk classic.

quizzes.title: La La Land
clues: An aspiring actress and a jazz pianist fall in love in Los Angeles.
It's a vibrant, colorful musical with choreographed dance numbers.
A memorable scene takes place at the Griffith Observatory.
The film explores the compromises made for artistic dreams.
It's a modern take on classic Hollywood musicals.

quizzes.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
clues: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a fierce female warrior drives a war rig.
The entire film is essentially one long, high-octane chase.
A character plays a flamethrowing guitar.
Water is a precious commodity controlled by a tyrannical leader.
It's a relentless action film set in a desert.

quizzes.title: Arrival
clues: A linguist is recruited to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.
The aliens communicate through circular, ink-like symbols.
The narrative structure plays with non-linear time.
A 'weapon' turns out to be a gift of communication.
It's a thoughtful science fiction film about language and perception.

quizzes.title: Her
clues: A lonely writer falls in love with an artificial intelligence operating system.
The AI develops and evolves, leading to complex emotional dynamics.
Their relationship is conducted entirely through voice interaction.
The protagonist's job involves writing personal letters for others.
It's a poignant romance set in a near-future Los Angeles.

quizzes.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
clues: A washed-up actor, famous for playing a superhero, tries to revive his career on Broadway.
The film appears to be shot in one continuous take.
He's haunted by the voice of his former costumed persona.
A drum score underscores much of the film.
It's a satirical black comedy about ego and artistic ambition.

quizzes.title: Drive
clues: A Hollywood stuntman moonlights as a getaway driver.
Its neo-noir style is characterized by a sleek aesthetic and a synth-heavy soundtrack.
A scorpion jacket is his signature attire.
He attempts to protect his neighbor and her son.
It's a stylish crime thriller with minimal dialogue.

quizzes.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
clues: A couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories.
The narrative shifts between memories and reality, often collapsing into each other.
Joel and Clementine are the names of the main characters.
A blue hair dye changes throughout the story.
It's a unique sci-fi romance exploring memory, relationships, and regret.

quizzes.title: No Country for Old Men
clues: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and a suitcase of money.
He's relentlessly pursued by a cold-blooded killer with a bizarre weapon.
The weapon is a captive bolt pistol.
The killer often lets fate decide by flipping a coin.
It's a violent neo-western with a philosophical undertone.

quizzes.title: Prisoners
clues: When his daughter goes missing, a desperate father takes matters into his own hands.
A detective with a distinctive tattoo investigates the case.
Mazes and a red whistle are recurring symbols.
The film is set in a gloomy, rainy Pennsylvania.
It's a dark and intense thriller about abduction and justice.

quizzes.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
clues: A concierge and his lobby boy become embroiled in a theft and murder mystery.
The film is known for its distinctive symmetrical visual style and vibrant color palette.
A valuable painting, 'Boy with Apple,' is central to the plot.
M. Gustave and Zero Moustafa are the main duo.
It's a whimsical and meticulously crafted ensemble comedy-drama.

quizzes.title: Mulholland Drive
clues: A hopeful actress moves to Los Angeles and encounters an amnesiac woman.
The narrative famously shifts dramatically halfway through.
A blue box and a blue key are mysterious recurring objects.
The Silencio Club and a small old couple are key elements.
It's a complex, dreamlike neo-noir film often described as a puzzle.

quizzes.title: Stalker
clues: Three men journey through a mysterious, forbidden area called 'The Zone'.
Their destination is a room said to grant wishes, but only to those with pure intentions.
The film is characterized by its slow pacing and philosophical dialogue.
A wet dog often accompanies the trio.
It's a seminal Soviet science fiction art film.

quizzes.title: Cache (Hidden)
clues: A Parisian couple receives mysterious, unnerving video tapes of their home.
The film explores themes of guilt, colonialism, and surveillance.
A long, static shot outside a building is a crucial revelation.
A chicken's head is symbolically severed.
It's a chilling psychological thriller by a renowned Austrian director.

quizzes.title: The Turin Horse
clues: It depicts the repetitive, desolate existence of a father, his daughter, and their horse.
The film is shot in stark black and white, featuring long takes.
The sound of the wind is a constant, oppressive presence.
It's said to be inspired by a real-life incident involving a philosopher and a horse.
This minimalist Hungarian film explores the end of the world.

quizzes.title: Synecdoche, New York
clues: A theater director builds an increasingly elaborate and realistic stage play within a warehouse.
The play replicates his own life and eventually, the lives of everyone around him.
Time passes at an accelerated and surreal pace within the narrative.
Miniature models and doppelgangers become part of the artistic process.
It's a deeply philosophical and melancholic film about art, mortality, and identity.

quizzes.title: Under the Skin
clues: An enigmatic woman drives around Scotland, luring men into her van.
Her motives and identity are slowly revealed to be extraterrestrial.
The victims are submerged into a black, viscous pool.
Many scenes feature hidden cameras and non-professional actors.
It's a minimalist, unsettling sci-fi horror film known for its atmospheric dread.

quizzes.title: The Master
clues: A tormented World War II veteran falls under the sway of a charismatic cult leader.
The cult, known as 'The Cause', involves 'processing' sessions.
One character performs a series of rapid-fire questions and answers.
It's set in post-WWII America and explores themes of faith, manipulation, and trauma.
The film is loosely inspired by the origins of Scientology.

quizzes.title: A Ghost Story
clues: A recently deceased man returns to his home as a sheet-clad spectral entity.
He silently watches his grieving wife and the passage of time.
A long, uninterrupted scene involves a character eating a pie.
The film plays with themes of time, memory, and existentialism.
It's a contemplative, melancholic drama with a distinct visual style.

quizzes.title: The Lighthouse
clues: Two lighthouse keepers on a remote New England island descend into madness.
The film is shot in black and white with a nearly square aspect ratio.
Seagulls and mermaids feature prominently in their hallucinations.
The older keeper is obsessed with the light at the top of the tower.
It's a psychological horror film about isolation and escalating tension.

quizzes.title: Burning
clues: A struggling aspiring writer encounters a mysterious and wealthy young man.
The disappearance of a woman leads to an unsettling investigation.
A cat named 'Boil' is mentioned but never truly seen.
The film features a memorable dance sequence at sunset.
It's a slow-burn South Korean psychological thriller based on a short story.

quizzes.title: Barton Fink
clues: A high-minded New York playwright comes to Hollywood to write a wrestling movie.
He struggles with writer's block and the bizarre inhabitants of his hotel.
The peeling wallpaper in his room becomes a focal point of his anxiety.
The phrase 'I'm a writer, I write' is repeated often.
It's a darkly comedic and surreal film by two famous brothers.

quizzes.title: A Serious Man
clues: A physics professor's life unravels as he seeks answers to his misfortunes.
The film explores themes of fate, faith, and the arbitrary nature of suffering.
Three different rabbis offer increasingly unhelpful advice.
A blackboard filled with complex equations is a recurring visual.
It's a dark comedy-drama set in 1960s suburban Minnesota by the same two famous brothers.

quizzes.title: Holy Motors
clues: A mysterious man travels around Paris in a limousine, embodying different characters.
Each 'appointment' involves him transforming into a new persona and performing a bizarre act.
One segment features him as a grotesque creature kidnapping a model.
The film is a surreal exploration of identity, performance, and cinema itself.
It's an enigmatic French art film with no clear plot.

quizzes.title: Melancholia
clues: Two sisters grapple with an impending planetary collision with Earth.
One sister experiences severe depression, while the other tries to maintain normalcy.
The film opens with a series of slow-motion, painterly tableaux.
A homemade 'shelter' is built as the end approaches.
It's a visually stunning and emotionally devastating drama by a controversial Danish director.

quizzes.title: The Tree of Life
clues: It explores the origins and meaning of life through the memories of a middle-aged man.
The narrative seamlessly interweaves scenes of a 1950s Texas family with cosmic imagery.
Voiceovers ponder profound questions about nature and grace.
Dinosaurs and the birth of the universe are depicted.
It's a highly artistic and meditative film by a reclusive American director.

quizzes.title: Eraserhead
clues: A man living in a bleak industrial landscape struggles with fatherhood.
The film is renowned for its disturbing, dreamlike atmosphere and stark black-and-white visuals.
A radiator lady sings and dances in a surreal sequence.
His infant child is a grotesque, bandage-wrapped creature.
It's a cult surrealist horror film, the debut feature of a famous director.

quizzes.title: Perfect Blue
clues: A pop idol transitions to acting and finds her reality blurring with her new roles.
She is stalked by an obsessive fan and experiences increasingly disturbing hallucinations.
Mirrors and reflections are frequently used motifs.
A scene involving a photoshoot for a controversial magazine is key.
It's a groundbreaking animated psychological thriller from Japan.

quizzes.title: The Act of Killing
clues: Former Indonesian death squad leaders reenact their mass killings in various film genres.
The documentary explores the psychology of perpetrators and the nature of impunity.
One character dresses in flashy suits, like a gangster.
The subjects often break into song and dance routines.
It's a shocking and powerful documentary that blurs lines between reality and performance.

quizzes.title: Dogtooth
clues: Three adult children are confined to their isolated family compound, taught a distorted reality.
Their parents invent new meanings for common words, like 'sea' meaning 'armchair'.
Aeroplanes flying overhead are explained as toys falling from the sky.
The children are trained to believe cats are dangerous monsters.
It's a darkly comedic and unsettling Greek film about extreme control and manipulation.

quizzes.title: The Lobster
clues: Single people are forced to find a partner within 45 days or be transformed into animals.
The protagonist chooses to become a specific sea creature if he fails.
A strict hotel environment enforces rigid social rules.
The film features a 'loner' community in the woods.
It's a deadpan absurdist comedy exploring societal pressures to be in a relationship.
